name: Added support for server-side C4 includes
body:
Added the `server_include_whilelist` configuration which is a list of regular expressions used to define which files can be safely included
by the server.
Useful when using a [Kroki](https://kroki.io/) server for remote diagram rendering.

name: Added retry on server errors or rate limits
body:
Connection errors can occur when using remote servers to render diagrams, especially in the case of many diagrams.
These are usually connection errors due to limitations on the number of calls.
This release solves these kinds of problems.

name: Removed forgotten test code
body: Removed test code that caused problems with Windows.

name: Added Kroki server support
body:
With this release a [Kroki server](https://kroki.io/) can be used as replacement for a [PlantUML server](https://plantuml.com/server) for remote image rendering.
In the case of a Kroki server there are a couple o different behaviors:
* image maps are note (yet) supported by the server, disable them with the `image_maps` configuration
* Kroki does not render an image with syntax errors; instead, a text with kroki's error message is inserted in place of the image.

name: Fixed rendering of yaml structures with remote server
body: When rendering plantuml yaml diagrams on a remote server, the spaces were removed from the lines and the diagram was not drawn as expected.

name: Removed an unused `plantuml` import
body: Removed a forgotten import after removing the `plantuml` package.

name: Fixed external includes
body:
Rendering via servers using external includes (as in [AWS Hello World Icons](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-icons-for-plantuml#hello-world) did not work due to the url defined by a `!define` directive.

Also, removed dependecy from the `plantuml` package.

name: Fixed image map detection on Windows
body: On Windows the image map detection was not working properly cause the different end-of-line terminator.

name: Ffixed error with external plantuml server
body:
When using an external PlantUML server to render diagrams, if a diagram has syntax errors and the remote server returns an error code (HTTP >= 400), and exception was thrown immediately stopping markdown parsing.
Now the error is intercepted and logged, and markdown can continue its work.

name: Removed unnecessary uuid lib requirement
body:
This is a minor fix, remove the unnecessary lib `uuid` requirement .
Thanks to @borystua  pointing it out (see #60).

name: Added support for image maps
body: When the output format is `png` and the diagrams contains an hyperlink, a `map` tag and related `area` tags are added to the output so the links are active.

name: Forced utf-8 encoding for source files
body:
Now the character encoding for external files (referenced by the `source` parameter) is `utf-8`, even in Windows.
Use the `encoding` configuration option to force a different character encoding.

name: Fixed multiple mixed code blocks
body:
Fixed parsing of mixed `fenced_code` and `plantuml_markdown` blocks in
the same document (see #45).

name: Minor changes
body:
* fixed UML source diagram inside fenced code (refs #45)
* external source diagram through `source` option is now prepended to  the inline code (both are kept) (refs #47)

name: Added support including diagrams from files
body:
Now is possible to include diagram code from external files.
Fixed also a minor bug with the `object` HTML tag.

name: Removed annoying debug messages
body: Removed a forgotten instruction that was setting the log level to debug, causing some debug messages to be written in the output.

name: Tested with Python 3.8
body: Fixed the failing tests.

name: Added plugin priority configuration
body: Added the `priority` plugin confiiguration which can be used to fine tuning the plugin execution order.

name: Support for ~ in cachedir
body:
* added support for `~` shortcut for `cachedir`
* fixed square brackets in documentation
* fixed handling of special characters in `alt` and `title` options (fixes #70)

name: Fixed rendering in indented blocks
body: Fixed rendering when using diagrams in indented blocks, such as lists.

name: Fixed pip installable packages
body:
In release 3.1.1 there was an extra file in pip packages that that was preventing the plugin from working properly.
This new new release fixes the packages.

name: Fixed compatibility with Markdown 2
body: Fixed a compatibility issue that prevented the usage of the plugin with Markdown 2.x.

name: Added diagram caching
body:
Added diagram caching to avoid re-render unchanged diagrams.
To enable caching, the configuration option `cachedir` must be set to a path to be used as a cache.

The plugin is now available also in [chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/packages/plantuml) (thanks to @majkinetor).

name: Renamed module from `plantuml-markdown` to `plantuml_markdown`
body:
**THE PLUGIN NAME HAS CHANGED FROM plantuml-markdown TO plantuml_markdown**.
The the tools configuration (markdown, mkdocs, ecc.) **MUST** be changed accordingly.

Sorry for this new change in the module name, but the dash was a big problem for who needs to import it.

name: Fixed UTF-8 character handling in `svg_inline` format
Fixed package bundle
body: Fixed a small error in building bundles for pip installation.

name: PlantUML server support
body:
With this version the diagram rendering can be done using a [PlantUML server](http://plantuml.com/server).
To overcome a Python module name conflict with another library, **THE PLUGIN NAME HAS CHANGED FROM `plantuml` TO `plantuml-markdown`**.
The the tools configuration (`markdown`, `mkdocs`, ecc.) **MUST** be changed accordingly.

name: Added options to limit image size
body:
* Added `width` and `height` attributes
* Fixed navigable links in inline SVG (resolves #18)

name: Added two new output formats
body:
* `svg_object`: generate a `object` tag for embedding svg diagrams
* `svg_inline`: insert svg diagram directly in the document

name: Fixed wrong HTML attribute `classes`
body:
The generated HTML was containing a wrong `classes` attribute instead of
the `class` attribute.

name: GitLab/GitHub support and variuos fixes
body:
* added support for GitLab/GitHub syntax
* added a title macro option, for generating diagram tooltips
* fixed generation of class and alt attributes
* fixed handling of unicode characters

name: Inline images
body:
* images are now inlined, no more files around
* added txt diagram format

Big thanks to @kubilus1.
